sentences.sContent: Spread low-fat cream cheese on a whole-wheat bagel (or English muffin) and then top with sliced tomatoes for a yummy sandwich.
sentences.sContent_eng: Spread low-fat cream cheese on a whole-wheat bagel (or English muffin) and then top with sliced tomatoes for a yummy sandwich.
sentences.sCn: 低脂全麦面包圈（或英式松饼）脂肪奶酪，然后用美味的三明治切片西红柿涂在上面。

sentences.sContent: Make something yummy, like popcorn or a cup of special herb tea, to make reading time something your daughter looks forward to.
sentences.sContent_eng: Make something yummy, like popcorn or a cup of special herb tea, to make reading time something your daughter looks forward to.
sentences.sCn: 做些美味的食品，比如说爆米花或一杯特别的香草茶，使你女儿更加期待阅读时光。

sentences.sContent: So quite quickly you can use your intelligence to change your perception of yummy bread to toxic sludge.
sentences.sContent_eng: So quite quickly you can use your intelligence to change your perception of yummy bread to toxic sludge.
sentences.sCn: 因此，你可以用你的聪明才智修改你对美味的面包印象，把它设为一团有毒污泥吧。
